attributes.action: Remove warmfront (monopoly) from goverment grant schemes and allow people on benefits to give their full grant to local trusted engineers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the last year it has come to my knowledge as a local heating engineer that "warmfront" and its subsiduary company, "Iguana," have been demanding grossly overinflated prices for additional labour to people receiving benefits. Such people receving the benefits are being forced to find additional sums of money to subsidise the warmfront grant scheme, i.e, £600 to fit two additional radiators. I find this completely immoral and tantamount to daylight robbery of vulnerable people.
